title: Star Guardian skins
body: When will the new Star Guardian skins actually be available? Been very excited for them just wish I knew when I can actually buy them

replies.body:
I just checked and it looks like the Skins and bundle are now available on the NA store!!! :D

Let me know if you have any questions. ^.^
Puzzle me this, the page for star guardians hasnt had the fourth story or the quizz added as of yet, is there more to them on the way that we should know about?

have you ever watched a show that ended with "to be continued?"

i guess its that.
